mapper.select: SELECT p.*, f.* FROM product p LEFT OUTER JOIN prod_file f ON p.prod_no = f.prod_no WHERE p.prod_no = #{prodNo}

SELECT c.*, p.prod_name, p.prod_price, p.prod_detail, f.prod_origin_name, f.prod_stored_name FROM cart c LEFT OUTER JOIN product p ON c.prod_no = p.prod_no LEFT OUTER JOIN prod_file f ON p.prod_no = f.prod_no WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
